attributes.action: pass a law to prohibit UK companies outsourcing to poorer nations for lower wages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many large UK companies are now outsourcing their customer services to overseas (India, etc) in order to avoid having to pay higher UK minimum wages to UK residents.

We are requesting that the UK companies are forced to pay the minimum wage to overseas call centre staff as this would help the world's economy instead of thinking about their own back pocket.

Remember, if you are not a part of the solution, you are a part of the cause.
